page.title: 14EDUCATION IN TODDINGTON AREA
page.content: In our area,{education}operates on a three-tier system. From the age of 5 children attend either Harlington or Toddington St. George Lower Schools. The latter also houses a Nursery Unit. At 9 they move to Parkfields Middle School in Toddington. There they study a broad-based curriculum which is continued on transfer to Harlington Upper School at 13+.{Partially-hearing {units}are incorporated in all schools except Harlington Lower. Adult Education is available in the area. One of the most popular{playground {games}is "Coventry". Somebody is "it" and you have to get home without being seen. If the catcher sees you he runs home and shouts "Coventry" and you are out. First home is "it" next time. The Lower Schools had a simple{school {rule}- "Take care of yourself and other people".
